span.span: Scales and rotates a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持仅正交转换，如旋转 90 ° 递增，增量为转换和缩放转换。 supports only orthogonal transforms such as rotation transforms of 90° increments and scale transforms. 不支持转换扭曲图像。Transforms that skew the image are not supported. 实现接口来优化对多个属性的初始化。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 只能在对象初始化过程中进行属性更改。Property changes can only occur during object initialization. 调用发出信号的初始化已开始和发出信号的初始化已完成。Call to signal that initialization has begun and to signal that initialization has completed. 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。After initialization, property changes are ignored. 使用创建的对象自动初始化构造函数和属性更改将被忽略。 objects created using the constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored. 如果应用转换后，将图像保存到文件，则必须更新到图像数据相关的元数据标记。Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.
